channel.title: RSCFobia - Long-term 24/7 | Agility FULLY included!(Only server with ALL skills)
channel.description:
Intro: We are one of the most close servers to real RSC. One of the bot-free servers! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cjSN2JD1FDs - made by "Elf"
Hello, MoparScape members! It has been quite a while since RSC was closed to free players and there are, in fact, some servers around. But they all die in a day or two.
Let me introduce you a NEW server: RSCFobia! Why is this better than all others? It has ALL skills. You can even train agility, at Gnome Agility course! Experience rate is fairly low, but not too low. Whenever you want to go to wilderness to kill people, you can use ::fatigue command and get your fatigue instantly to 100%! Sounds great? There's more...
RSCFobia is only server with agility & all skills functioning properly! This is only server that has them all done(even agility shortcuts).
Server's moderator-team is very friendly and helpful against new players. They won't supply you with free items, though, but they do help you out if you are in trouble.
RSCFobia has MANY active events every week and an easter drop coming this weekend, which brings together MANY players all over the world. This is a friendly, BOT-FREE community, which is enjoyable for everyone.
There are all monster drops 100% like in real RSC, world looks like that aswell, enough of fake maps!
The server has also working and MULTI-FUNCTIONAL highscores! You can view your own characters even, or filter the results by people on your friends list! It is really advanced and great system.
So what are you waiting for? Grab your weapons, armor and start your epic adventure on this, brand-new long-term server! Call all your friends and make server even more enjoyable.
I pretty much enjoy it and all my friends do. I think this is the best server. It has no autoers and the administrators do know what they are doing. Best and most advanced server out there! :P ---------------- Client: [url=http://www.speedyshare.com/626184147.html]SpeedyShare[/url] You must register at forums and register a character to be able to play. See you ingame!
Credits: Reines - Thanks for your v25 base. Pr4y - Releasing previous ultraGo - Logo Ecko - Few smaller functions Me - All the rest, starting from little bug fixes to fixed NPCs to agility and upcoming Quest system

Right now i dont have much to do with RSCHeros, it’s Termz who is coding etc.

[/quote]

Crappy one though, when you look into added code…it looks horrible.

item.title: RSCFobia - Long-term 24/7 | Agility FULLY included!(Only server with ALL skills)
item.dc:creator: @firewithin3 firewithin3
item.description:
@firewithin3 wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:73, topic:243035”][quote author=adu link=topic=319359.msg2550297#msg2550297 date=1227475045]

You’re right

I just usually get upset with people who complain about someone using there code for there server when the server is stolen from the beginning.

But enough ranting

What the hell is “stolen”. the source got released as development purposes, therefore everyone is entitled to use it. K09’s client was released in order to play the game, hence decompiling the client and taking code form it is really stealing if not credited properly.

[/quote]
I didn’t realize Reines publicly released his source. Never knew someone to get so angry because he released his own source.

But he didn’t release it himself.[/quote]He didn’t release it himself, the only person to get angry from releasing their OWN source, is hixk.

Read full topic

K09’s client was released in order to play the game, hence decompiling the client and taking code form it is really stealing if not credited properly.[/quote]As you might have noticed, there is none on my current clients, so nothing is stolen. However, they are on my private client, but this will never be released and I already gave the credits for that, on the screenshot, last page. So what’s the problem?

And btw, Reines never released his source. It got leaked by Pr4y, aka “stolen”. Because still, it’s somehow Reines’s work.

Read full topic

item.title: RSCFobia - Long-term 24/7 | Agility FULLY included!(Only server with ALL skills)
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“Ecko, post:69, topic:243035”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=319359.msg2550178#msg2550178 date=1227471656]

It’s like 4 lines of code

Where’s your credit to the people who made RSCd base? And Reines?

You don’t even look at what you upload on to your site
www.rscangel.org/toolbox.php - made by Reines (and rofl at PHP 4, time to upgrade?)

(5) Credits

Client - Anon + all those people who spent hours decompiling and
re-writing the client, ty.

Server - Reines 99% of the credit for the server goes to you - (Peter

  • xEnt - Anon, ty for the support, coding and otherwise)

Staff - Moose, Meh, Wicked, Pyroblazer, Aust1n, you lot started this
and without you we wouldn’t be here today. Thanks to DvD, Ryan, your
support+++++++. Thanks to the rest of our mods.

Nothing wrong with PHP4 and so what if there’s a toolbox there…?
[/quote]

And credits for the base? There would be no server without the base. Not to mention a lot of the data Reines recieved to update the game was from regular contributing members (CamHart, Alex, j0hnnie, Brian). Also, you’re using Darkarmy’s self-created images on your highscores page.

So fuck off that someone used a few lines of code you thought of to make.

And the toolbox is Reines’ own code. It has nothing to do with PunBB or RSCDaemon. Why did you steal someone else’s code and put in on your website?

Oh wait that’s right. The whole server is stolen[/quote]

The toolbox has the credits on the page… This is nothing to do with stealing code it’s about knowingly stealing code and not crediting it.

I can’t give credit to people when I don’t know that they should be credited. However now that you’ve highlighted the fact that I’m missing some important credits I shall include them.

Though, what Stashah did was different, he knew that he decompiled and stole code from my client and therefore has no excuse for trying to hide that fact.

As for: “it not being hard to do”, if it’s not hard to do then why waste time decompiling a client and just code it yourself?

Stashah, didn’t realise it was your forum, oh wait, it isn’t. Don’t tell me what I can and cannot post or where I can post it.

Read full topic
item.source: RSCFobia - Long-term 24/7 | Agility FULLY included!(Only server with ALL skills)
